members.name: setObject
members.comment: Set the object to be customized. This method should be called only once, before the Customizer has been added to any parent AWT container.

members.name: addPropertyChangeListener
members.comment: Register a listener for the PropertyChange event. The customizer should fire a PropertyChange event whenever it changes the target bean in a way that might require the displayed properties to be refreshed.

param: listener - An object to be invoked when a PropertyChange event is fired.

members.name: removePropertyChangeListener
members.comment: Remove a listener for the PropertyChange event.

param: listener - The PropertyChange listener to be removed.

name: java.beans.Customizer
comment:
A customizer class provides a complete custom GUI for customizing a target Java Bean.

Each customizer should inherit from the java.awt.Component class so it can be instantiated inside an AWT dialog or panel.

Each customizer should have a null constructor.
